details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.3.3 Annotations appearances - Normal appearance
details.description: For all annotation dictionaries containing an AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key.

rule.description: For all annotation dictionaries containing an AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key.

error.message: Annotation's appearance dictionary contains entries %1 other than N
